name: get_data_for_landing_page_tool
description: Get the relevant information needed to create the website like their product/project name, industry, purpose of landing page like marketing, event promotion, for a social cause etc. Start with 4-5 questions and then depending on the answers given ask further questions.

question_format.description: The format of the question, and expected answer format, from only these options: text, radio, checkbox, scale, datepicker

question_text.description: The actual question text string that the user will be asked, this should be a question that the user will be asked to answer, and the question should be in the format of a question that the user will be asked to answer

question_meta.description: Additional metadata based on the question_format

options.description: An array of options for radio and checkbox question_format

min.description: The minimum value for the scale question_format

max.description: The maximum value for the scale question_format

answer_type.description: The expected answer type, text, radio, checkbox, scale, datepicker

answer_values.description: The expected answer values, for radio and checkbox answer type, comma separated options will work, additionally some questions might not and answer like if we ask the users age, only answer type scale is enough for such questions the key NULL can be passed
